item.title: [stx] Campus Guide
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Campus Guide enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

item.title: [stx] Bury in Books
item.description:
Instant

This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets an attacking creature.

Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top.

item.title: [stx] Beaming Defiance
item.description:
Instant

Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

item.title: [stx] Academic Probation
item.description:
Sorcery — Lesson

Choose one —

• Choose a nonland card name. Opponents can't cast spells with the chosen name until your next turn.

• Choose target nonland permanent. Until your next turn, it can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2021-03-29-revealing-some-brand-new-magic-the-gathering-strixhaven-cards

item.title: [stx] Flamescroll Celebrant // Revel in Silence
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman // Instant

https://www.twitch.tv/nessameowmeow

item.title: [stx] Codie, Vociferous Codex
item.description:
Legendary Artifact Creature — Construct

You can't cast permanent spells.

{4}, {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. When you cast your next spell this turn, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile an instant or sorcery card with lesser mana value. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put each other card exiled this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

https://twitter.com/Deathsie/status/1376746353414537216

item.title: [stx] Combat Professor
item.description:
Creature — Bird Cleric

Flying

At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains vigilance until end of turn.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/968567497

item.title: [stx] "Nightmare's Beverage"
item.description:
Instant

You gain 2 life. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.

item.title: [stx] Venerable Warsinger
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Cleric

Vigilance, trample

Whenever Venerable Warsinger deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the amount of damage that Venerable Warsinger dealt to that player.

https://www.kotaku.com.au/2021/03/mtg-strixhaven-preview-new-spells/

item.title: [stx] Elite Spellbinder
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

Flying

When Elite Spellbinder enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand. You may exile a nonland card from it. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may play it. A spell cast this way costs {2} more to cast.

https://twitter.com/PVDDR/status/1376318085817372674

item.title: [stx] Rip Apart
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Rip apart deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [sta] Eliminate
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature or planeswalker with converted mana cost 3 or less.

item.description:
Instant

Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

item.description:
Sorcery

Target player takes an extra turn after this one.

item.title: [sta] Infuriate
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.

https://kai-you.net/article/79881

item.title: [sta] Approach of the Second Sun
item.description:
Sorcery

If this spell was cast from your hand and you've cast another spell named Approach of the Second Sun this game, you win the game. Otherwise, put Approach of the Second Sun into its owner's library seventh from the top and you gain 7 life.

item.title: [sta] Divine Gambit
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile target artifact, creature, or enchantment an opponent controls. That player may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield.

item.title: [sta] Defiant Strike
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Draw a card.

item.title: [sta] Day of Judgment
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy all creatures.

item.title: [sta] Teferi's Protection
item.description:
Instant

Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.)

Exile Teferi's Protection.

item.title: [sta] Revitalize
item.description:
Instant

You gain 3 life.

Draw a card.

item.title: [sta] Mana Tithe
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

item.title: [sta] Gods Willing
item.description:
Instant

Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color.)

Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

item.title: [sta] Gift of Estates
item.description:
Sorcery

If an opponent controls more lands than you, search your library for up to three Plains cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [sta] Ephemerate
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

item.title: [sta] Blue Sun's Zenith
item.description:
Instant

Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

item.title: [sta] Compulsive Research
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.

item.title: [sta] Brainstorm
item.description:
Instant

Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

item.title: [sta] Whirlwind Denial
item.description:
Instant

For each spell and ability your opponents control, counter it unless its controller pays {4}.

item.title: [sta] Time Warp
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player takes an extra turn after this one.

item.title: [sta] Tezzeret's Gambit
item.description:
Sorcery

({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)

Draw two cards, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.title: [sta] Strategic Planning
item.description:
Sorcery

Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

item.title: [sta] Negate
item.description:
Instant

Counter target noncreature spell.

item.title: [sta] Mind's Desire
item.description:
Sorcery

Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)

Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

item.title: [sta] Memory Lapse
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

item.title: [sta] Counterspell
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell.

item.title: [sta] Agonizing Remorse
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it or a card from their graveyard. Exile that card. You lose 1 life.

item.title: [sta] Village Rites
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.

Draw two cards.

item.title: [sta] Tendrils of Agony
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

item.title: [sta] Tainted Pact
item.description:
Instant

Exile the top card of your library. You may put that card into your hand unless it has the same name as another card exiled this way. Repeat this process until you put a card into your hand or you exile two cards with the same name, whichever comes first.

item.title: [sta] Sign in Blood
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

item.title: [sta] Inquisition of Kozilek
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with converted mana cost 3 or less. That player discards that card.

item.title: [sta] Eliminate
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature or planeswalker with converted mana cost 3 or less.

item.title: [sta] Duress
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

item.title: [sta] Doom Blade
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target nonblack creature.

item.title: [sta] Dark Ritual
item.description:
Instant

Add {B}{B}{B}.
